item.title: Deploying Polaris on Amazon Web Services (AWS)
item.description: Build and launch Polaris using the AWS Startup Script at the location provided in the command below. This script will start an Amazon RDS for PostgreSQL instance, which will be used as the backend Postgres instance holding all Polaris data. Additionally, Polaris will be bootstrapped to use this database and Docker containers will be spun up for Spark SQL and Trino. The requirements to run the script below are: There must be at least two subnets created in the VPC and region in which your EC2 instance reside.
